name: Onur Varol
about:
PI of the VRL Lab.
researcher📊, coder💻, dreamer💭
bio: Dr. Onur Varol is an Assistant Professor at the Sabanci University Faculty of Engineering and Natural Sciences and Principal Investigator at the VIRAL Lab. His research focuses on developing techniques to analyze online behaviors to improve individual well-being and address societal problems using online data. Prior to joining Sabanci University, he was a postdoctoral researcher at Northeastern University at the Center for Complex Network Research. He completed his PhD in Informatics at Indiana University, Bloomington (USA). His thesis focuses on the analysis of manipulation and threats on social media and he was awarded the 2018 University Distinguished Ph.D. Dissertation Award. He has developed a system called Botometer to detect social bots on Twitter and his team ranked top 3 worldwide at the 2015 DARPA Bot Detection Challenge. Efforts on studying social bots yield publications on prestigious venues such as International Conference of Web and Social Media (ICWSM), Nature Communications, World Wide Web (WWW) conference, and Communications of the ACM. He interned at Microsoft Research for two summers during his PhD to develop causal analysis of large-scale social media timelines. He is currently working on quantifying success of online personas and impact of their actions. He is also modeling user interactions, leveraging online data across multiple platforms to understand conscious and unconscious behaviors.
education: Ph.D. Informatics, Indiana University, 2017
M.Sc. Computer Science and Engineering, Koc University, 2012
B.Sc. Physics Engineering, Istanbul Technical University, 2012
B.Sc. Electronics Engineering, Istanbul Technical University, 2010

name: Ismail Ulutürk
about: Interested in wireless, social, and gluten networks.
bio:
He is a recent PhD from University of South Florida, studying machine learning applications for technological and social networks. He is particularly interested in decentralized multi-agent cooperation and decision making. His current projects include collaborative trajectory control for a novel aerial Radio Access Network utilizing Reinforcement Learning, and studying the implications of the existence of social bots.
He also have 8 years of start-up industry research and development experience with a company developing healthcare RFID / IoT solutions where I joined as one of the first 10 employees, working on design and development of several products that are currently deployed in hospitals internationally throughout all stages of the product cycle.
education: PhD in Electrical Engineering, University of South Florida, 2020
MSEE in Electrical Engineering, University of South Florida, 2017
BSc in Electrical Engineering, Istanbul Technical University, 2012

name: Burak Özturan
about: Investigating the online behaviour of Turkish Members of Parliament
bio:
Burak Ozturan is a computational social science researcher. He is currently doing his MSc in Data Science at the University of Konstanz. He gained his Bachelor's degree in Economics from Bogazici University. His research interests are at the intersection between data science and social sciences. He is employing both social network analysis and computational text analysis methods to study disinformation and online polarization and public opinion.
He participated in the SICSS (Summer Institute in Computational Social Science) in 2020. He presented his Turkish Twittersphere during the COVID-19 pandemic research at ECPR (European Consortium for Political Research). He is also currently carrying out research with Dr. Onur Varol investigating the online behaviour of Turkish Members of Parliament and planning to compare with US Senate.
education: MSc in Data Science, Universität Konstanz, 2020
BSc in Economics, Bogazici University, 2018

name: Barış Temel
bio: Barış Temel is a Data Science MSc. student at Sabancı University. He is also a data science enthusiast with 1 year experience in the banking industry as a data analyst. He studied BSc in Industrial Engineering with a minor Finance in Sabancı University. During his BSc, he was involved in various projects. He conducted a group study as a graduation project which was about Investigating Electrical Vehicle Costs and Benefits in Istanbul. After graduation he self-educated himself with online courses on data science concepts like Machine learning, Deep Learning, and Python specific courses. He worked as a Data Analyst in Finansbank as a management trainee and learned the real life applications of finance and data processing. He learned to gather and process the data using SQL and he had an opportunity to work with a simple anomaly detection project using Python in finance. His area of interests merge with those trending topics.
education: BSc Minor in Finance, Sabanci University, 2018
BSc in Industrial Engineering, Sabanci University, 2018

name: Mutlu Soruklu
bio: Mutlu Soruklu is currently doing his MSc in Data Science at Sabanci University. He received his bachelor’s degree in Industrial Engineering from Sabanci University. His research area focuses on machine learning, statistical analysis, and optimization. He is interested in the applications of various machine learning algorithms in health-related data. He is carrying out his master’s thesis with Dr. Onur Varol searching for relations of exercise with well-being and mental health.
education: BSc in Industrial Engineering, Sabanci University, 2020

name: Özgür Can Seçkin
bio: Özgür Can Seçkin is a MSc Data Science student at Sabancı University. He started working on sentiment analysis with NLP, other machine learning algorithms and web scraping while he was doing his undergraduate in Galatasaray University Economics. After graduation, he got a job at İş Bankası as a credit analyst, where he was involved in projects about credit risk evaluation, monitoring and loan automation. His objective is to create a better understanding about how society works, using data.
education: BSc in Economics, Galatasaray University, 2019

name: Davut Bayık
bio: Davut Bayık is a Data Science MSc student at Sabanci University. He graduated from the same university with an Industrial Engineering degree in 2020 June. He also has a minor degree in Finance. He conducted a summer internship at SabanciDx's SAP Support and Consultancy Department in summer 2019. After the internship, he joined SabanciDx as a part-time SAP Consultant when he was a senior student at Industrial Engineering, from between 2019 October – 2020 July. During summer 2020, he started a second internship at Kariyer.net R&D Department. At Kariyer.net, he worked with Data Scientists on an ongoing recommendation systems project to design two types of recommendation systems: behavior-based recommendation system using collaborative filtering and content-based recommendation system using machine learning. At the end of my internship, these two systems are combined and become a hybrid recommendation system for Kariyer.net. Davut is broadly interested in deep learning and statistics.
education: BSc Minor in Finance, Sabanci University, 2020
BSc in Industrial Engineering, Sabanci University, 2020

name: Özgün Yargı
bio: Özgün Yargı is a Data Science MSc. Student in Sabancı University. He also completed his undergraduate program in Sabancı University as Mechatronics Engineer. During his undergraduate period, he dealt to combine Machine Learning algorithms with embedded systems that will allow robustness and automation. He worked on implementing Machine Learning algorithm to his Inverted Pendulum Project. This implementation allowed system to maintain its stable position. He focused on gathering different dataset types to get familiar with them. He applied competitions that were published by McKinsey, Kaggle, ISIC to improve himself individually. His main interest of area is object detection and classification with deep learning algorithms.
education: BSc in Mechatronics Engineering, Sabanci University, 2020

name: Umut Duygu
bio: Umut Duygu is a Political Science M.A. Student at Sabancı University. He holds bachelor’s degrees in International Relations and History from Koç University. He worked as an intern for several organizations including United Nations, Istanbul Policy Center and Hürriyet. He is carrying out his master’s thesis with Dr. Onur Varol. His main points of interest are Digital Diplomacy, Misinformation and Voter Behavior.
education: BA in International Relations, Koç University, 2020
BA in History, Koç University, 2020

name: Mert Öztürk
bio: Mert Ozturk is currently continuing his MSc in Data Science at Sabanci University. He received a bachelor's degree in Statistics from Middle East Technical University in 2020. During his undergraduate education, he participated in several projects which use statistical analysis methods and machine learning algorithms and, he had the chance to work with different datasets from various fields such as economics, psychology, and mobile applications. Currently, He conducts research on the fluctuation of the sentiments of Twitter users.
education: BSc in Statistics, Middle East Technical University, 2020

name: Güneş Özgün
bio: Güneş Başak Özgün is a senior Mechatronics Engineering and Computer Science & Engineering double major student at Sabancı University. She is currently interested in computational social science focused on music. Her interest stems from her goal to learn more about the connection between social sciences and computer science. She conducted research with Dr. Onur Varol on the relationship between binaural characteristics of playlists on Spotify and their popularity.
education: BSc in Mechatronics Engineering, Sabanci University, 2020
BSc in Computer Science, Sabanci University, 2021

name: Elif Nur Öztürk
bio: Elif Nur Öztürk is an undergraduate Computer Science and Engineering student at Sabancı University. She is especially interested in data science and gender studies. She creates contents about artificial intelligence applications and blockchain technology within The Turkish Informatics Foundation’s initiative.

name: Omay Ece Ayyıldız
bio: As an undergraduate Computer Science student at Sabancı University, Omay Ece Ayyıldız is specifically interested in computer science’s intersection with social contexts; especially social inequalities. She has conducted research in gender equality and wrote articles about artificial intelligence developments.

name: Furkan Okuyucu
bio: Furkan Okuyucu is a Data Science MSc. student at Sabanci University. He received his bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Sabanci University. He worked on computer networks on his graduation project. He presented the result of this work on Balkancom19 conference in Skopje. On his graduate course projects he worked on parallel architectures, convolutional neural networks, generative adversarial networks. He is also a data scientist at Oredata. He is currently carrying out his master’s thesis on coordinated activity detection on social media with Dr. Onur Varol.
education: BSc in Computer Science, Sabanci University, 2020

name: Ege Ötenen
next: Dual PhD, Informatics and Cognitive Science at Indiana University
bio: Ege is currently continuing her MSc in Cognitive Psychology at Sabanci University. She is graduated from Middle East Technical University. She is mainly interested in autobiographical memory,  individual differences, visual imagery, spatial ability. She is enthusiastic about learning different techniques, and she aims to combine her memory research with computational methods.  She is working with Dr. Onur Varol and her teammates on a project about Vaccine Perception, which she presented at Summer Institute in Computational Social Science (SICSS, 2021).
education: BA in Psychology, Middle East Technical University, 2020

name: Doğukan Kefeli
bio: Dogukan is a Physics Engineering student at Istanbul Technical University. Worked on nuclear instrumentation on his graduation thesis in ITU. Currently working on computer vision and deep learning.

name: Serhat Demirkıran
bio: Serhat Demirkıran is a Data Science MSc. student at Sabancı University. He received his bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering from İstanbul Technical University. During his undergraduate, he joined the project team ITU Rover and worked on autonomous navigation for UGV. He studied recommender systems for his graduation project, developed a model to predict tweet engagement rates as a problem presented by RecSys Challenge 2020. He is interested in user behaviour and misinformation lately.

name: Fatih Arda Zengin
bio: Fatih Arda Zengin is a CS student at Sabanci University and he is interested in Cyber Security. He works at VRL lab as TUBITAK STAR program fellow to contribute on “Causal analysis of daylight saving time and quantifying its impact on wellbeing”

name: Ege Demirci
bio: Ege Demirci is an undergraduate Computer Science and Engineering student at Sabanci University. He is currently trying to improve himself in the fields of data science and machine learning, apart from the computer science education he received at school. He is particularly interested in researching social sciences with the help of Data Science and Machine Learning.

name: Nihat Muğurtay
education: BA in Philosophy, Bogazici University, 2013
MA in Philosophy, Bogazici University, 2016
Bachelor of Laws, Kadir Has University, 2013
PhD in Political Science, Sabanci University, 2022
bio: Dr. Nihat Muğurtay has a Ph.D from Sabanci University, Political Science department. His doctoral dissertation focuses on China, Turkey, and the United Arab Emirates' global foreign aid behavior, explaining how geopolitical and economic factors shape non-traditional donors’ response to OECD-DAC donors. He has taught International Political Economy at Sabancı University. Apart from academics, Nihat has extensive research experience on youth radicalization and ethnic issues in Turkey and worked in different thinks-tanks as a consultant and researcher, including International Crisis Group and TESEV. Nihat joined Viral Lab as a post-doctoral researcher in August 2022, and desires to link international relations with computational methods.  Nihat employs quantitative methods in his research and aims to sharpen his methodological skills by adopting computational tools, including Web Scraping and social media analysis. He has advanced experience in STATA and Latex.

name: Vahid Khalili
education: BSc in Electronic Engineering, Islamic Azad University, 2014
MSc in Executive Management, Islamic Azad University, 2017
bio: Vahid Khalili Param is a Computer Science Ph.D. student at Sabanci University. He was involved in several projects with main focus on opinion dynamics and sentiment analysis on social media. He holds a Master’s degree in Executive Management from Islamic Azad University, Science and Research Branch in Iran. His research interest is the emerging intersection of data analytics, social physics, and computational social science to study the dynamics of human collective behavior under the influence of the social digital interactions of individuals. Social innovation, civic engagement, and data-driven policy-making platforms are also his research interests as connecting dots to his future academic life. He was involved in a research project for a national call during a pandemic where he used social media content analysis, sentiment analysis, NLP, and other techniques to extract opinions and emotions from objective social media data. He has a professional background of social media strategist and growth hack mentoring for several companies and start-ups in Iran.
